scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: cd backend/services/auth-service && npm run build && cd ../profile-service && npm run build && cd ../chat-service && npm run build && cd ../appointment-service && npm run build
scripts.db:setup: cd shared && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../services/auth-service && npm run lint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/*/node_modules backend/services/*/node_modules shared/node_modules
